sait.frms.manager

Class FlightManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.frms.manager.FlightManager

  • public class FlightManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for managing the flights.
    Version:
    2019-07-02
    Author:
    Nick Hamnett

      • findAirportByCode

        public java.lang.String findAirportByCode(java.lang.String code)
        Finds an airport with code.
        Parameters:
        code - Airport code
        Returns:
        Airport object or null if none found.

      • findFlightByCode

        public Flight findFlightByCode(java.lang.String code)
        Finds a flight with code.
        Parameters:
        code - Flight code.
        Returns:
        Flight object or null if none found.

      • findFlights

        public java.util.ArrayList<Flight> findFlights(java.lang.String from,
                                               java.lang.String to,
                                               java.lang.String weekday)
        Finds flights going between airports on a specified weekday.
        Parameters:
        from - From airport code.
        to - To airport code.
        weekday - Day of week (one of WEEKDAY_* constants). Use WEEKDAY_ANY for any day of the week.
        Returns:
        Any found Flight objects.

      • populateFlights

        private void populateFlights()
        Populates flights ArrayList with Flight objects from CSV file.

      • populateAirports

        private void populateAirports()
        Populates airports with Airport objects from CSV file.
